title: Seeking student to build their portfolio: help build my website PLEASE
description: I have been a business owner of 22+ years. However, my lovely clients over the past five years have decided to short change me every single time. Therefore, I am starting a new business, but I need help. I need a kind, talented, and artistic person to help me with a website. Ideally, you would be someone who has an interest for the arts, vintage, antiques, etc. I am not looking for a cold, basic site. Can you help? I am able to help with internships and college credits if you put me in touch with professors, etc. If the image posted appeals to you- that is my style.

title: looking for an editor
description: My name is Roxas Bhroanain, I am looking for a work for hire editor,  this person will need to submit a portfolio detailing many different aspects of photography from weddings down to long exposures. I need to know what im hiring. I am not looking for one time project or per time project this is an opportunity for a company approved on call editor that is not an employee but a contractor under my company. direct competition will not be accepted you will be my companies contractor and do nothing but work closely with me. I will take shots and you will edit them. terms and conditions of contract will be sent to desirable contractor applicant of choice. contractor will do work remotely and on occasion be held at Venue for meetings. initial meeting and quarterly. our sucesses will be shared together through company events that will be to inspire trusting atmosphere between company and contractor this will.be milestone celebrations and so on. Please apply only if interested in long haul contracting without hire under direct competition and years of building relationship with company through skills and atmosphere.im not looking for a runner. if I wanted one id go to a track

title: Convert photo to painting (several $100 gig)
description:
I want to make a painting out of a photo I took and gift it to someone.
But i want to be part of the creation process so this job will involve me providing the supplies (lmk what you need eg paint, canvas; i will send you the pic and we can discuss), and then we make it together.
I am a rank beginner nor artistically included. We have 8 weeks if we start on april 6th to get this done. You can do the heavy lifting but coach me on simpler aspects of the painting. Open to watercolor/acrylic/oil etc. and style (realistic vs more impressionist etc.) size of painting, we can discuss all of it.
PS. Im getting photoshop inquiries and to be clear this is an actual painting gig we are copying a picture I took onto canvas

title: Comic artist needed
description: Looking for comic book style artists, the writer/filmmaker is looking to develop several comics based on original scripts. Dark DC styled action/superhero themed. Looking to start with a few pages, main poster type page and a couple based on main characters. Approx 4,5 color pages to start. I will provide reference images. This is a low budgeted project. Please let me know your rate.

title: Digital Marketing & Web Design Specialist (Part-Time, In-Person)
description:
Location: Midtown Manhattan, New York (In-Person Meeting Required Weekly)
About Us:
We are a fast-paced, growing medical practice committed to delivering exceptional care and service to our patients. We are looking for a creative, tech-savvy individual to lead our digital presence and help us grow online.
Position Overview:
We are seeking a Digital Marketing & Web Design Specialist who can manage and elevate our online presence through expert website design, engaging social media content, and effective email marketing. The ideal candidate is highly organized, experienced in medical branding or healthcare marketing, and comfortable meeting in person once a week at our Midtown office.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, maintain, and update our website (WordPress or similar platforms)
Develop engaging content for Instagram, Facebook, and other relevant platforms
Plan and execute email marketing campaigns (Mailchimp, Klaviyo, or similar)
Monitor and analyze website and social media metrics to track performance
Create branded graphics, promotional materials, and content for seasonal campaigns
Ensure all content aligns with HIPAA guidelines and the brandâ€™s tone of voice
Attend weekly in-person meetings in Midtown to collaborate with the team and review progress
Requirements:
Proven experience in website design and digital marketing
Strong skills in graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Suite)
Experience with social media management tools (e.g., Hootsuite, Buffer)
Familiarity with SEO best practices and Google Analytics
Excellent communication and organizational skills
Ability to meet deadlines and work independently
Prior experience in healthcare or medical aesthetics is a plus
Schedule:
Part-time with flexible hours (Weekly in-person meetings required in Midtown)
